SELECT d.name AS agencyName,d.id AS agencyId,mgrade,bgtime,endtime,grade1,grade2,grade3,grade4,grade5 FROM ( SELECT a.agency_id, max( a.result_grade ) AS mgrade, IF ( TIMESTAMPDIFF( DAY, DATE_SUB( current_date(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR ), b.time ) > 0, b.time, DATE_SUB( current_date(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) ) AS bgtime, current_date() AS endtime, Count( a.result_grade = 1 OR NULL ) AS grade1, Count( a.result_grade = 2 OR NULL ) AS grade2, Count( a.result_grade = 3 OR NULL ) AS grade3, Count( a.result_grade = 4 OR NULL ) AS grade4, Count( a.result_grade = 5 OR NULL ) AS grade5 FROM supervise_record a INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(create_time) AS time , agency_id AS b_agencyId FROM supervise_record WHERE `status` = 1 AND target_type = 1 GROUP BY agency_id ) b ON a.agency_id = b.b_agencyId WHERE a.`status` = 1 AND a.create_time < current_date() AND a.create_time >= IF ( TIMESTAMPDIFF( DAY, DATE_SUB( current_date(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR ), b.time ) > 0, b.time, DATE_SUB( current_date(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) ) GROUP BY a.agency_id ) c INNER JOIN org_agency d ON c.agency_id = d.id WHERE d.is_delete = 0

NAME AS agencyName, a.agency_coordinate AS agencyCoordinate FROM ( SELECT MAX(result_grade) AS grade, agency_id AS eId FROM supervise_record AS e INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(create_time) AS min_time, agency_id AS cId FROM supervise_record c WHERE `status` = 1 AND target_type = 1 GROUP BY agency_id ) AS b ON e.agency_id = b.cId WHERE `status` = 1 AND create_time >= IF ( b.min_time < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), b.min_time ) AND create_time < CURDATE() GROUP BY e.agency_id ) AS r LEFT JOIN org_agency AS a ON r.eId = a.id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY grade
